data.title: Engineering Solutions that bring True Value to Customers: TekStream Solutions
data.text:
“Driven by the veterans of Stellent, BEA, Plumtree, and early Oracle technology, TekStream Solutions has the expertise to quickly and methodically solve and execute end-to-end IT solutions.”

Based out of Atlanta, USA, TekStream Solutions blends business consulting and technology implementation expertise to help companies manage the massive volumes of content and internet-based services that have been created over the past decade as well as take advantage of next generation enterprise social networking and collaboration solutions.

More importantly, as an Oracle consulting company, TekStream helps companies find new ways to leverage those assets to fuel innovation, improve new customer relationships and reduce costs as they look at the next 5-10 years of growth.

Oracle offers a robust suite of software especially suited to solving today’s content challenges. As an Oracle consulting firm, TekStream Solutions has a unique and entrepreneurial culture built by individuals who are fanatically driven to exceed client expectations and work in partnership with our clients and partners to deliver results.

Technical Focus

By combining in-depth technology consulting with strong recruiting experience, TekStream offers thorough qualification of technical needs and validation of candidates. Its resource offerings include consulting and recruiting around Enterprise Content Management, Enterprise Portal, Web Strategy and Application Development.

The company’s core offerings include:

Business Strategy and Design Services

Enterprise Content Management Solutions

Enterprise Collaboration and Social Networking Solutions

Enterprise Portal Solutions

Information Technology and Technical Recruiting

TekStream’s expertise offerings include:

Enterprise Content Management

Oracle UCM (including Document Management, Web Content Management, Records Management, Digital Asset Management, Image & Process Management, Information Rights Management, Document Capture and legacy Stellent)

Other Content Management Platforms (Alfresco, Documentum, Autonomy/Interwoven TeamSite, and FileNet)

View Datasheet

Portal Upgrade and Development

Oracle Portals (including WebCenter Suite, legacy AquaLogic/Plumtree, BEA Portals, Oracle Portal and Sun Portal)

Other Portal Platforms (Vignette, Liferay, etc.)

View Datasheet

Web/Application Development/Server Administration

JAVA/ JEE – Apache, Struts, Spring, Hibernate, Open Source

UI & Front End – PHP, AJAX, Flash, Flex, JavaScript, jQuery, DOJO, YUI, GWT, JSF (Rich Faces)

Application Server – WebLogic, Tomcat, JBoss

Oracle-specific Development

Oracle Applications – PeopleSoft, Hyperion, Financials, HR, Supply Chain

Oracle Infrastructure / Administration – Database and Systems Administration and Configuration

Oracle SOA Fusion Middleware – 10g and 11g experience (BPEL, SOA Suite, ESB, Business Rules, BPM, Web Service, BAM, ADF)

Functional

Business Analysis and Design

Project Management

Product Management

Quality Assurance

TekStream Service Offerings

TekStream Solutions specializes in addressing the company-wide IT problems faced by enterprise businesses. Its certified consultants have led over 250 deployments and take pride in providing pre-packaged solution services as well as customer specific enhancements. Each of its projects leverage TekStream’s proven “QuickStream” delivery methodology and TekStream’s consultants average over 12 years of experience with Oracle implementations.

TekStream Service Solutions include:

QuickStream – a rapid requirements analysis, design, and road mapping service that enables customers to get started fast and begin capturing value from their Oracle WebCenter investment

Full Lifecycle Deployment Services – a cost-effective implementation that includes design, development, production, and project management

Engineered Solutions – a set of reusable assets, methodologies, components, and connectors developed to facilitate and expedite Oracle WebCenter Implementations

Meet the Leader

Robert C. Jansen, CEO and President – Rob leads daily business operations and oversees the development and execution of the Company’s growth strategy and initiatives. Rob has been in the information technology sector for nearly 15 years providing leadership, consulting and implementation services to leading Fortune 1000 clients. Working with his team of industry-leading executives, Rob oversees all TekStream practice areas and functional disciplines including sales, solution development, and client delivery. Prior to founding TekStream, Rob was Vice President of Sales for Enterpulse/Idhasoft and responsible for forging and managing the strategic alliances of the company, including Oracle, and for selling the solutions which Enterpulse/Idhasoft implemented for its clients. In addition, Rob was responsible for managing and maintaining the company’s sales forecast and serving on an executive team to manage the company’s strategic decisions for sales growth, resource investments, and operational strategy including the profit and loss report.

Prior to joining Enterpulse/Idhasoft, Rob spent over 7 years with Plumtree Software and BEA Systems, Inc. (acquired by Oracle, Inc.) in a variety of roles including Southeast Area Sales Manager, Sales Engineering Lead and Implementation Manager, where he provided license sales, process and technical consulting services for the design, development, and implementation of business solutions. During this time, Rob had the opportunity to work with startup, regional and global companies including the American Cancer Society, ExxonMobil and Proctor and Gamble. In addition, Rob was part of the Management Consulting practice of PriceWaterhouseCoopers, where he helped global organizations design and develop Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solutions using SAP. Rob received a Bachelor of Science in Systems Engineering with a minor in Management Information Systems (MIS) from the University of Virginia. Rob currently resides in Atlanta with his family.
